description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原名汪志天，祖籍安徽桐城。曾任北京大学代理党委书记，是中国人民政治协商会议第六、七届全国委员会委员，史学家余英时的表兄。
description.en: Chinese politician, born Wang Zhitian, with ancestral roots in Tongcheng, Anhui. He served as the acting party secretary of Peking University, was a member of the 6th and 7th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, and was the maternal cousin of historian Yu Yingshi.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名大学。项子明曾在此学习并长期担任领导职务。
description.en: A renowned university in China where Xiang Ziming studied and later held long-term leadership positions.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第六届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第六届全国委员会
en: 6th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会
en: 7th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，项子明的表弟。
description.en: Chinese historian, younger maternal cousin of Xiang Ziming.

description.zh-cn: 清末举人，曾任良乡县令，是项子明（原名汪志天）的祖父。
description.en: A Juren in the late Qing Dynasty who served as the magistrate of Liangxiang County. He was the grandfather of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 民社党革新派负责人，著名民主人士，项子明（原名汪志天）的三叔。
description.en: A leader of the reformist faction of the China Democratic Socialist Party and a prominent democratic figure. He was the third uncle of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 曾任蒋纬国汉文老师、行政院救济总署分配厅厅长，项子明（原名汪志天）的五叔。
description.en: Former Chinese literature teacher to Chiang Wei-kuo and director of the distribution department of the Executive Yuan's relief agency. He was the fifth uncle of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，蒋中正之子，曾师从于汪伏生。
description.en: A General of the Republic of China Army, son of Chiang Kai-shek, who was tutored by Wang Fusheng.

description.zh-cn: 曾任职于北洋政府财政部，是项子明（原名汪志天）的父亲。
description.en: He worked in the Ministry of Finance of the Beiyang Government and was the father of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 中国的首都，项子明的出生地及主要工作地点。
description.en: The capital of China, birthplace and primary work location of Xiang Ziming.

nodes.id: 北京师范大学附属中学

zh-cn: 北京师范大学附属中学
en: The High School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的一所著名中学，项子明曾在此就读。
description.en: A famous middle school in Beijing where Xiang Ziming once studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于北平的一所中学，项子明曾在此就读高中。
description.en: A middle school in Beiping where Xiang Ziming attended high school.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期创办的一所具有统一战线性质的干部学校。
description.en: A cadre school with a united front nature established by the Communist Party of China during the Yan'an period.

en: North China Bureau of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在华北地区的派出机构。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the Communist Party of China in the North China region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 项子明是史家余英时的表兄。
description.en: Xiang Ziming was the maternal cousin of historian Yu Yingshi.

description.zh-cn: 汪心濂是项子明（原名汪志天）的父亲。
description.en: Wang Xinlian was the father of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 汪炘是汪心濂的父亲，项子明（原名汪志天）的祖父。
description.en: Wang Xin was the father of Wang Xinlian and the grandfather of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 汪世铭是项子明（原名汪志天）的三叔。
description.en: Wang Shiming was the third uncle of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 汪伏生是项子明（原名汪志天）的五叔。
description.en: Wang Fusheng was the fifth uncle of Xiang Ziming (born Wang Zhitian).

description.zh-cn: 汪伏生曾任蒋纬国的汉文老师。
description.en: Wang Fusheng once served as Chiang Wei-kuo's Chinese literature teacher.

relationships.target: 北京师范大学附属中学

description.zh-cn: 项子明曾考入北平师大附中就读。
description.en: Xiang Ziming was admitted to and studied at the High School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 1935年一二·九运动时，项子明曾参加游行。
description.en: During the December 9th Movement in 1935, Xiang Ziming participated in demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 1938年5月，项子明到延安，在陕北公学分校学习。
description.en: In May 1938, Xiang Ziming arrived in Yan'an and studied at a branch of the Shaanbei Public School.

description.zh-cn: 1945年11月，项子明考入北京大学法律系。
description.en: In November 1945, Xiang Ziming was admitted to the Law Department of Peking University.

position.zh-cn: 城市工作部大学工作委员会委员
position.en: Member of the University Work Committee of the Urban Work Department

description.zh-cn: 作为华北局城市工作部大学工作委员会委员和北京大学地下党负责人，项子明兼管中法大学的地下党工作。
description.en: As a member of the University Work Committee of the Urban Work Department of the North China Bureau and the head of the underground party at Peking University, Xiang Ziming also oversaw the underground party work at the Institut Franco-Chinois de Chine.

description.zh-cn: 作为华北局城市工作部大学工作委员会委员和北京大学地下党负责人，项子明兼管朝阳大学的地下党工作。
description.en: As a member of the University Work Committee of the Urban Work Department of the North China Bureau and the head of the underground party at Peking University, Xiang Ziming also oversaw the underground party work at Chaoyang University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

position.en: Director of the General Office, Secretary-General

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，项子明被撤职，并被遣送至山西下放劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Xiang Ziming was dismissed from his post and sent to Shanxi for manual labor.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

position.en: Deputy Head of the Culture and Publication Department

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第六届全国委员会
中国人民政治协商会议第七届全国委员会
